records.cool_rich_verbatim: {"ID": "magic_wand", "duration": 80527, "segment_type": "SENTENCE", "participants": [{"participant_id": "0", "gender": "FEMALE", "type": "CLIENT", "is_bot": false}, {"participant_id": "1", "gender": "FEMALE", "type": "AGENT", "is_bot": false}, {"participant_id": "2", "gender": "MALE", "type": "AGENT", "is_bot": false}, {"participant_id": "3", "gender": "MALE", "type": "AGENT", "is_bot": true}], "segments": [{"participant_id": "0", "start": 0, "end": 2183, "text": "Hello? Is this the Magical Support Hotline?"}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 2483, "end": 5664, "text": "Yes, you've reached the right place! How can I assist you today?"}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 5964, "end": 11653, "text": "Well, my magic wand isn't working properly. I tried casting a spell to turn my annoying neighbor into a frog, but nothing happened!"}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 11953, "end": 17595, "text": "Oh dear, let's see what we can do to fix that. Have you tried waving your wand in a figure-eight pattern while chanting 'Abracadabra'?"}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 17895, "end": 19915, "text": "Yes, I've tried that, but still no luck!"}, {"participant_id": "2", "start": 20215, "end": 27436, "text": "Greetings! This is the Magical Support Specialist. Have you attempted to charge your wand under a full moon? Sometimes they just need a little celestial boost."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 27736, "end": 31149, "text": "Hmm, no, I haven't tried that. Let me go outside and give it a shot."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 34749, "end": 38487, "text": "Okay, I'm back, but I think I accidentally turned my cat into a newt instead!"}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 38487, "end": 44455, "text": "Oh no! Don't worry, we'll get that sorted out. Have you attempted to reset your wand by tapping it three times on a dragon scale?"}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 44755, "end": 49051, "text": "Dragon scale? I live in a suburban neighborhood, where on earth am I going to find a dragon scale?"}, {"participant_id": "3", "start": 49351, "end": 56039, "text": "Beep boop! Have you considered the ancient technique of blowing into the wand's magic core, much like you would with a video game cartridge?"}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 56339, "end": 59102, "text": "Blowing into it? Well, it's worth a try, I guess."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 61702, "end": 64163, "text": "Hey, it actually worked! My wand's working again!"}, {"participant_id": "2", "start": 64163, "end": 71152, "text": "Fantastic news! Just remember, next time you encounter a magical mishap, our support team is always here to help. Have a spellbinding day!"}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 71452, "end": 75887, "text": "Thank you all so much for your help! I'll definitely keep your number handy for next time. Goodbye!"}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 76187, "end": 77603, "text": "Goodbye and happy spellcasting!"}, {"participant_id": "3", "start": 77903, "end": 80527, "text": "Farewell, magical friend!
